/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on one side and towering buildings on the other. A handful of cars can be seen navigating the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds dotting the horizon. The predominant colors in the image are green, blue, and gray, painting a vivid picture of a day in the life of this vibrant city.
